go along.translation[0].definitions[0].d: if you do something as you go along, you do it without planning or preparing it
go along.translation[0].definitions[0].e: He was making the story up as he went along.
I never had formal training, I just learned the job as I went along.
go along.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to go to an event or a place where something is happening
go along.translation[0].definitions[1].e: I might go along to the meeting tonight.
go along.translation[0].definitions[2].d: to happen or develop in a particular way
go along.translation[0].definitions[2].e: Things seem to be going along nicely.
